name: Utawarerumono: Shiro he no Michishirube
description: Announced during the Aquaplus 30th Anniversary livestream, it will release in Q4 2025. It is a sequel to Monochrome Mobius with the same gameplay system but further evolved.

name: Pegglo
description: Join Pegglo, the hedgehog hero, in this Peggle-like game with a roguelike twist! Tackle a series of unique levels, master critical hits, and choose powerful upgrades. Every game is a new adventure!

name: Sanrio Timenet World
description: Sanrio Timenet World is a cancelled video game in the Sanrio Timenet series. The game was meant to be a spinoff to the Game Boy games Sanrio Timenet: Kako-Hen and Mirai-Hen and would interact with them via the Transfer Pak.

name: The Fool
description: A story driven 2D point and click about an unknowing character. Non is a mild manner new villager just moving into their own. They're excited to live a comfortable, peaceful life and get to know the other towns folk.

name: Idle Outpost
description: Embark on a journey of survival and commerce in Idle Outpost: Upgrade Games, a captivating idle business simulator and tycoon game set against the backdrop of a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies. As the overseer of a burgeoning trading outpost, strategic management skills are crucial for not just thriving but ensuring the continuation of humanity.

name: Vibin'Vendetta
description: VIBINVENDETTA is a traditional fighting game inspired by classic flash games from the early 2000s. You play as 14 different characters from the group known as Vibing With the Gang, with their own unique powers and fighting styles, across two different stories and twenty stages. The game is still actively being developed, with it currently in it's second version.

name: The Stray Laboratory
description: Avoid your fears, survive the experiments, explore your prison and figure out a way to escape. The stray laboratory is a puzzle / horror game designed using PS1-era mechanics and graphics combined with modern-day physics and lighting capabilities. The Stray Laboratory is inspired by games such as Resident Evil, Silent Hill and Maniac Mansion, as well as movies such as The Shining, Psycho and Guest House Paradiso.

name: Restaurats
description: А restaurant management simulator, where players take on the role of a company of rats striving to be the best in their field. Players are tasked with managing all aspects of the restaurant, starting from cooking dishes and drinks, to serving visitors and developing the establishment

name: Bamboozle
description: Bamboozle is an adventure themed puzzle game and offers great brain exercises for all ages. Complete quests by navigating the explorer across over 150 unique puzzle boards. Complete all the steps to "discover" an ancient artifact or rare animal. Engaging hand-drawn artwork, a fun soundtrack, and addictive puzzles!

name: Vs. Vemny & Friends
description: Sin descripción

name: After Dark: Under the Moonlight
description: After Dark: Under the Moonlight is an Action Role-playing game developed and published by Game Square Interactive for Java mobile phone.

name: Relics of the Oracle
description:
In Relics of the Oracle, step into the forgotten and the unknown in a first-person adventure that blends classic adventure mechanics with real-time 2.5D exploration. Embark on a journey through time and mystery, exploring a game that has resurfaced after decades of being lost and shrouded in urban legend.

Experience a metafictional narrative that pulls you into its depths as one of the first to rediscover this long-lost title. Navigate through hauntingly beautiful landscapes ranging from dense, whispering forests to the desolate ruins of an ancient civilization. Each environment is meticulously handcrafted to challenge your wits and reward your curiosity.

Inspired by adventure games like the Zork series, Relics of the Oracle holds that classic gameplay close to its heart and invites players to get lost in its atmosphere.

name: EA Sports FC Tactical
description: interactive simulation with turn-based opportunities to defend, attack, perform Skill Moves, and make attempts on target, resulting in authentic football action like never before. Every moment of gameplay empowers you through strategic decisions made on the pitch.

name: Home Together
description:
Home Together is a real-time adult game made in unreal engine 5

Create your own characters in an extensive character creator
Save and share creations with other players
Invite your creation to your house and have adult fun together
Play as male in first person and female in third person
Choose between many adult sex poses across the house
Voice acted female character
Experimental VR support

name: Fusionfall Legacy
description: FusionFall Legacy (abbreviated as Legacy or FFL) was an in-development fangame based on Cartoon Network Universe: FusionFall, which was being developed for over five years by a team of devoted fans.

name: Hexepta: Logic Hack
description: Argus Hakan becomes a defense attorney at Hexepta Legal Academy, a law school that follows it's own legal system. The game was cancelled mid development.

name: Acquittal: Induction
description:
Acquittal: Induction, the first installment in a planned series, was born from inspiration from Capcom's Ace Attorney series and is in many ways a homage. Alternating between investigating criminal cases at the crime scene and defending clients in heated courtroom trials, it inherits its basic mechanics from the classic visual novel series, while taking and running with those core concepts.

It has been on an indefinite hiatus since April 06, 2018.

name: Slender: The Arrival VR
description: Slender: The Arrival returns more terrifying than ever, now in VR.

name: Crossout: Early Access Pack
description: This pack includes:Unique armored vehicle ‘Bloodhound’;Vehicle weapon - 2 ‘Sledgehammer’ shotguns;Unique character portrait: ‘Aleph’;Paint can: Dark red, Pattern: Scorched Earth;2000 in-game coins.

name: Angel Legion: Future Dream - Blue
description: Sin descripción

name: Megaton Musashi W: Wired - Victory Pose: Drums
description: Sin descripción

name: Megaton Musashi W: Wired - Rogue: Arthur Riser - Dragon Green
description: Sin descripción

name: Visit Bloofpiter Today
description: Doctor Yakov Voldritch can't afford to rent his evil diabolical mind control lab and so he must take on a research mission by the Great God Bloof (God of the fluffy alien bunny people) to pay it off by logging strange organisms. You will come across many fancy mushrooms, strange hypnotic blobs, dog worms and even (yes!) some spooky horror (be warned).

name: Hypnotica Quest
description:
Welcome to Hypnotica Quest! You find yourself in a strange little sleepy town that is obsessed with hypnosis. Your curiosity gets the better of you and you sign up for an experiment at the laboratory at the end of the street.

This is a little walking simulator game where you get to experience actual hypnosis, giant rats, magical guinea pigs and meet the famous (or rather) infamous Doctor Voldritch.

name: Medivination
description:
A relaxing journey into the soul; Medivinations is a combination of meditation and divination, where the goal is not to predict the future but to ground yourself to the present. The goal is to be able to replay over and over again as each reading is random and up to you to decide if it works with your vibe or not as you're the true guide of your life, wanderer✧∘* ✧･ﾟ

You will be guided by a funky little bunny to chill out and let go of stress with various calming readings from planets, tarot, zodiac and more!

It's a short game, about 3-5 minutes but can be replayed as each reading is random.

name: Mezma's Revenge
description: A new addition to the past hypnotic visual novels involving 2 new hypnotists, each with their own style. You can pick New Age Bloof for a meditative journey, Dr. Voldritch if you miss his devious mad scientist charm or if you want something more intense, Elijah, a scheming super villain who likes brainwashing.

name: Engineerium
description:
Enter an ancient, alien world where gravity is not as it seems.

This is the fun, puzzling virtual reality walking journey that'll leave you questioning your own reality!

name: Singularity
description: Enter an immersive, science fiction shooter on a station stranded in the depths of space. Fight to the death against killer robots as you explore narrow corridors, treacherous lifts and zero-gravity environments. You will need to work together with your squad to get out alive, and find the answers you're looking for.

name: DeathTower
description: Wake up, Ikarus! DeathTower is an overclocked roguelite tactical RPG. Survive each floor of the megastructure. Stealth, hacking, devastating weapons... Do whatever it takes to fight your way to the top.

name: The Pepper Prince: Seasoning Pass (Episode 2-5)
description: Sin descripción

name: Blood Bowl III: Season 4
description: Wood Elf teams are incredibly popular, as they’re known to put on an impressive show – they’re just as likely to (literally) dance circles around their rivals as they are to get smashed in (literally) spectacular fashion. They play the game better than just about anyone else, and they look stunning while they’re at it.

name: Blood Bowl III: Season 3
description: Representing the traditionalist class of necromancy, these teams pick their players from the cream of the beyond, especially a thousand year-old Mummies, whitened Skeletons and starving Ghouls. And yet, they do not scorn a freshly risen Zombie, if he is stolen from the opposing team!

name: Blood Bowl III: Season 2
description: Underworld teams, big consumers of warpstone infusions and mushrooms from the remotest parts, welcome Goblins, Skaven, Trolls, Rat Ogres and Snotlings. These outcasts take their revenge on life by humiliating the richest teams.

name: The Legend Beyond Legends
description: A 3D or Pop-Up book adventure classic Point & Click game about strange legends. Challenge myths, receive powers, find the missing fisherman, and become a legend! 1-2 hours of gameplay for the entire family, original sound track, and great plot twist

name: The Month After
description: Loot, survive and PVP in a vast zombie infested city. Who knows you might make it to an extract.

name: Brass
description: As the player, you take on the role of Brass, delivering letters and packages while interacting with the villagers. One day, a letter from his grandma sets Brass off on a new adventure. With relaxing, story-driven gameplay and adorable low-poly art, Brass offers a cozy and heartwarming experience.

name: Cupiclaw
description: Cupiclaw is a roguelike deckbuilding claw machine game. Grab, sell and add prizes in order to take on increasingly expensive new machines, until you manage to recover Morris' lost engagement ring!

name: Major League Curveball
description: Welcome to the Major Leagues! In Major League Curveball, you dodge, strike, and get smashed by homing balls as you compete against players in this fast-paced, last player standing sports brawler.

name: Twisted Screens
description: In Twisted screens, you take control of Tessa an employee of Razzycat entertainment as she find herself in the Abandoned ATR facility with horrible experiments running loose in the facility. Tessa must team up with A.I companion Legsy to escape.

name: Halls of Greed
description:
Dive into the immersive roguelite RPG experience of Halls of Greed where every decision shapes your fame and fortune. Halls of Greed delivers a thrilling blend of intense PvPvE combat, the hunt for rare loot, and strategic extraction mechanics that will keep you coming back for “just one more round.”

Set in a world teeming with ancient magic and sinister creatures, players will embark on perilous journeys to extract valuable treasures from treacherous dungeons. But beware, fellow adventurers lurk in every shadow, ready to thwart your progress and claim the spoils for themselves.

Create characters from a diverse selection of classic fantasy archetypes, each with unique abilities and playstyles. Will you embrace the devastating spells of the mage, the discipline of the knight, the precision of the ranger, or the ferocity of the primalist? Each class offers a distinct approach to how you dominate the battlefield. Whether you're engaging in one-on-one duels or clashing with rival parties in team-based skirmishes, every encounter offers unique advantages and disadvantages so choose wisely!

However, the true measure of success lies in your ability to collect rare and powerful loot scattered throughout the crypts, castle ruins, and dungeons. Uncover legendary weapons, enchanted artifacts, and valuable resources that will enhance your abilities and secure your dominance on the battlefield. Be sure to extract through one of the magical portals using a keystone and return to camp where you can improve your character, level up your loadout, and give yourself key advantages for the next run!

name: Wrestler Rush
description: Wrestler Rush is a first-person, chair-throwing, backstage wrestling, kerfuffle where you concuss wrestlers backstage with an array of weapons from chairs to bowling balls across the UK wrestling independent scene!

name: World War 2 Agenda
description: Play as an American pathfinder soldier during World War 2 Go behind enemy lines to try to stop the enemy agenda of World Domination! Outsmart very accurate enemies in this very hard 3rd person shooter!

name: Yee-Haw!!
description: In this fast-paced roguelite, destroy thousands of enemies with the help of your cowboy and dozens of special powerups and weapons. Yee-Haw!!

name: Yan: Parasomnia
description: What begins as a simple funeral wake spirals into something far more sinister. As the Wan Siblings, explore their childhood home and uncover a dark plot, all the while surviving the malice of the tragic denizens trapped therein.

name: Xenos Hunters
description: Manage a squad of battle-hardened xenos-killing marines on their mission to cleanse the galaxy. Edit their Artificial Intelligence, customize their loadout and send them on their mission.

name: The Gaze of The Eternal Sun
description: The Gaze of The Eternal Sun is a yuri visual novel independently developed by the DogMade production team. It tells the story of the protagonist, Shikonomiya Sakuya, who is searching for the truth about her eternal life with the help of others.

name: Zhigu Military Exorcist
description: Horror FPS single-player shooter. The military exorcist fighting against weaves of demons and undead trying to invade the Earth. The game includes weapons, shooting, portals, interesting environment and different enemies with different abilities.

name: You Are Dead
description: Find magic weapons and abracadabra your way through colorful domains and their challenging bosses in this roguelite twin-stick shooter.

name: Delivery Driver Service
description: Let's work together to rebuild the region's infrastructure and overcome the challenges left behind by the devastating hurricane. By doing so, we can create new opportunities in the world of Delivery Driver Service.

name: Simon Shotgun Arms
description: Simon Shotgun Arms is a VR Shooter were you can only move with the knockback of your shotgun arms. Battle through different intense levels against mysterious enemies where your offense and mobility are intertwined.

name: Harvest Bliss
description: Chop, mine, collect, build, and harvest! Raise animals, catch fish, and uncover hidden treasures. Harvest Bliss is a relaxing farming and building game where friends can join you too!

name: Blinding Lite
description: Blinding Lite is an action-adventure platformer that focuses on tight acrobatic platforming. Venture forth and save the Elementals from their capture! Experience a flowing move set, a world brimming with character, and a world painted in NES colors!

name: Empty Shell: The Loop
description: Empty Shell: The Loop will take you into The Loop, a secret facility built on a Japanese island in the middle of nowhere. Volunteers are forced to enter the eerie rooms of the complex, seemingly without an exit. But what is that massive door in one of the rooms? Is there perhaps a way to escape?

name: Super Dash
description: Dash through enemies, collect power ups and survive waves of enemies in this fast paced bullet-hell

name: Magekeepers
description: Travel through realms as unique and powerful mages to restore the rift from corruption. Grow limitlessly more powerful and let nothing stand in your way.

name: Neon Village
description: This game is a fusion of a "roguelike deck-builder" and "match-3 puzzle". Collect unique residents to create explosive synergies and develop a village glittering with neon!

name: Survival Prototype X
description: Open world procedurally generated island survival game.

name: Pin To Win
description: "Pin To Win" is a pins-building light Rogue game that uses balls to trigger pins to produce different effects and build different powerful combinations. Please configure your pins and set off to fight!

name: Wrain
description: Wrain is a single-player cosmic adventure where your end is just the beginning. Solve intricate puzzles to appease Death, gain forbidden knowledge, and unravel the dark secrets of a mysterious island. Tread carefully—or else you may become another lost voice in the chorus of the damned.

name: Formula Circus
description: Join Formula Circus! Shape a dynamic racing career, manage your team, and customize everything in this immersive simcade. Your decisions on and off the track define your legacy.

name: Cyoube
description: Wake up in a cubic world, contrasting with what you represent. Follow Norman's voice, the universe itself, in a vibrant journey towards your fate. Will you fit in?

name: Ghoul Fright
description: Join Ghoul Fright! Coolest holy 3D beat em up, lead Walter and Eriko, a couple of Ghoul Hunters into a rampage of chaos and brawl into the waves of angry Ghouls who must return to hell.¿Ready to Fright?

name: The SpudFather
description: In "Spudfather," become Spud, a charming secret agent on a veggie-fueled mission. Use charisma to disarm foes, especially the beauties who make Spud blush. This ain't your average garden - it's a world where bad guys are ripe for the pickin'!

name: Tower Field
description: Tower Field is a roguelike tower defense game with a random generated world to explore and modular towers that you can customize and adapt to protect yourself from the dangers you discover.

name: Echoes in the Deep: A Fateforge Tale
description: It’s time for one last heist. How you achieve it is down to you. Explore the Free City, prepare and equip your crew, keep them loyal and navigate the difficult choices you’ll need to take to succeed.

name: Phantom Line
description: Join the paranormal SWAT. PHANTOM LINE is a co-op (1-4) shooter set in the post-nuclear European continent. Your mission is to search and contain paranormal events and activities (anomalies) hidden from the public eye, in an open world map full of dynamic events.

name: The Sacred Memory
description: The Sacred Memory is an ADV-visual novel with an exciting plot, mysterious events and vibrant characters. Reveal the secrets of MEMORIAL as the superpowered youngster!

name: Solnox: Grimoire of Seasons
description: Become the master of seasons in this tactical turn-based deckbuilder. Dominate the ever-changing battlefield by unleashing the four seasons and utilizing their terrain-altering effects. Learn to create perfect synergies & guide your three sorcerers to victory against unholy creatures.

name: Underground: World War
description: A brand new game inspired by the Def Jam series. Create your own fighter or play as some of your favorite rappers in this over the top fighting game

name: Nomu
description: In "NOMU," navigate the undead-infested Nevada desert, scavenging supplies, fortifying your vehicle, and evading relentless zombie hordes. Beware the Wendigo, a sinister creature of myth preying on the lost and desperate. Will you defy the odds as a survivor or succumb to the apocalypse?

name: Season Match 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Cosmic Consciousness
description: A first-person shooter set in a desolate land. You have to go to the inner universe again and again to become stronger.

name: Fuel Station Simulator
description: Are you ready for the most comprehensive fuel station simulation ever? Manage your fuel station, your shop, the car wash, the workshop, your employees and much more…

name: Pretend Cars Racing 2
description: An old school top-down racer with split-screen multiplayer, track editor and night and day transitions.

name: Monster Luv Radio
description: Welcome to MONSTER LUV RADIO, where you play a radio DJ giving dating advice to a host of supernatural creatures! Keep your ratings up by giving sound advice and following the rhythm of your DJ mix board, and make sure your boss doesn't shut down your show!

name: Invade
description: INVADE is a chaotic multiplayer party game for up to 4 players. Fight with an assortment of silly characters to capture your opponent's treasure chest, while avoiding the many explosive powerups!

name: Rimland
description: "Rimland" is an ARPG that invites players to explore a mysterious world. In the game, players can develop their characters, collecting equipment to enhance characters’ strength. The game offers a variety of gameplay, allowing players to play with different skill combinations and equipment setups.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Warhammer 40K Crossover Pack
description:
As part of the Season 2 Reloaded update for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III, three new Warhammer 40,000 Store Bundles are on the way. The first pack is inspired by the Space Marines, and includes Scout armour Operator Skins from the Ultramarines and Blood Angels 10th Companies, along with melee weapons inspired by the iconic chainsword as well as Weapon Blueprints with unique Warhammer tracers.

Tracer Pack: Warhammer 40,000 Sisters of Battle lets you armour up in the regalia of the Adepta Sororitas, complete with two Warhammer-themed Weapon Blueprints, custom tracers, and a host of other customisation items for your profile. Lastly, don the distinctive green-and-tan camouflaged armour of the Kasrkin with the final pack, including a Munitorum-issued blade, tracers that make your weapons look like they’re firing las bolts, and more.

name: Mr Mitty and the Itty Bitty Kitty Committee
description: Disaster has struck the island of cats! A ferocious storm has snatched the committee's important letters, plunging the feline paradise into chaos. But fear not, Mr. Mitty, is on the case!

name: Nightfall Wardens
description: "Nightfall Wardens", a co-op horror survival game set on a reality TV show. Survive haunted zones, manage your Fear, and win sponsorships for survival boost. Will you entertain and survive, or succumb to the shadows?

name: Disaster Slayer
description: Be a national secret agent with special abilities to face disasters. Leap across buildings to avoid lava in a disaster-stricken city. Procure vital national assets and classified documents. Drive an evacuation vehicle through debris-filled streets to reach the safe zone.

name: Lost Manor
description: Unravel the chilling secrets of a desolate manor in Lost Manor, a suspenseful horror adventure game. Venture into the decaying heart of a rural estate, shrouded in a veil of mystery and rumored to harbor unspeakable horrors.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Mechanicus II
description: Fast-paced tactical combat meets strategic management in this sequel to the acclaimed Warhammer 40,000: Mechanicus. Take control of either the ancient and deathless Necron legions or the techno-religious acolytes of the Omnissiah, with the fate of a world in your hands.

name: Blood Bowl III: Season 5
description: Sin descripción

name: Warhammer 40,000: Tacticus - Machines of War
description: The Machines of War update for Warhammer 40,000: Tacticus allows you to use a sixth unit on the battlefield as the machine appears off the hex grid as a station weapon. Machines have two main abilities, a primary which is always active. The secondary can be either an active or passive ability.

name: Conveyor Con-fusion
description: Build conveyor belt contraptions to navigate this open world puzzle adventure!

name: Super Mega Drive 3: 10 Super Jogos
description: Sin descripción

name: Confusion Conveyed
description: Use conveyor belts to solve increasingly complex puzzles in this open world expansion to Conveyor Con-fusion.

name: Fractal Factory
description: factory puzzle game

name: Growmi
description: Growmi entered a portal that took all of its powers away. Now, you'll need to help Growmi regain them back... Start small and grow big to prove to the world that you are the smartest of them all!

name: Permafrost
description: Embark on a brutal journey of survival in a perpetual winter. Hunt and gather resources for building and utilize deep survival mechanics to craft your way through a harsh, unforgiving landscape. Forge alliances or dominate the remnants of humanity in this chilling open world saga.

name: Silver Sonic: The Crystal Islands
description: Sin descripción

name: The Pepper Prince: Episode 4 - Lover's Peak
description:
Lover's Peak is a place full of memories and stories. Somewhere among them, you will find the key leading you back to your friend the pepper prince.

This DLC unlocks Episode 4 of The Pepper Prince: Seasoning 1, a quirky point-and-click adventure about love, grief, and the power of friendship. Solve puzzles, meet quirky fairy-tale-inspired characters, and help your friend regain confidence and self-love after heartbreak!

name: The Pepper Prince: Episode 3 - Into Thin Air
description:
The kingdom is in shock: The prince has disappeared and an oppressive mist has enshrouded the kigdom. Find the prince to save him and the kingdom!

This DLC unlocks Episode 3 of The Pepper Prince: Seasoning 1, a quirky point-and-click adventure about love, grief, and the power of friendship. Solve puzzles, meet quirky fairy-tale-inspired characters, and help your friend regain confidence and self-love after heartbreak!

name: Synapses
description:
A short 1 level platforming game made entirely from strata cut clay. Play as a neuron delivering information to the brain core, destroy neurons with sparks of electricity when they get in your way. Press 'F' to fire electricity, Arrow keys to move, 'space' to jump.

Music by Miles Pride.

TW: flashing colors

name: Alien Planet Bell
description:
Zean, the alien, has only one goal in this strategy game: Reach the bell. His mission starts out simple. A simple world with only him and a bell. There is nothing more. How will he reach it?

It is up to you, the player, to figure out what Zean has to do to reach the bell.

A game that started out as a game created for a game jam, now fully playable.

name: Gooncrusher
description: Welcome to the goonpocalypse. Gooncrusher is a high-octane, action-packed survival game where your vehicle is your weapon and your lifeline, and crushing goons is the name of the game! Are you ready to take the wheel? Your fight for survival begins now.

name: Maseylia : Echoes of the Past
description: Maseylia : Echoes of the Past is a 3d metroidvania that aims to reproduce the experience of a 2d metroidvania in 3d. It features a labyrinthine world in which you'll need to collect upgrades to unlock new passages and make your way out of the labyrinth.

name: Good & Bad Driver
description: "Good & BAD DRIVER" is a 3D FPS-TPS driving game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Play as Good, an ambulance driver doing noble work, who gets involved with bad people for money, becoming the BAD guy. Experience thrilling driving, horror, and adventure in this unique simulator.

name: W.A.R. Hangry
description: Join the clever penguins of "W.A.R. Hangry: The Last Tuxedo" in a battle royale aboard a colossal spaceship. Use recycled seafood launchers, navigate dynamic terrains, and manage your hunger to be the last penguin standing. Customize, strategize, and support ocean conservation!

name: StarryMonogatari: Student's Terminal
description: Starry Monogatari official app now available on PC! Let's meet various people in the world of Staｍono and feel the star-colored story!

name: Fear Virtual
description: The game features an SMG starting weapon, Three Release Maps : Rikers-Inn, Desert-Town and Storage-Facility. On each map are AK-47 weapon and M-4 Carbine pickup weapons to eliminate your opponent with. It will replace your SMG as your only and primary weapon, Capture the briefcase.

name: Through the Fog
description: - A exploration rogue lite mapping game - uncover the city's secrets through mini-games - sell your map quickly and efficiently to purchase upgrades

name: Asylum of Horror
description: Enter the Coldwood Asylum with the means to explore and document it's secrets, only to get lost and trapped with the horrors that lie within..

name: Gunflow
description: Use guns to combine elements in surprising ways to unleash powerful reactions. Loot artifacts to build the most unique and godlike builds. Go solo or with your friends up to 4 players.

name: Blair's Despair
description: Embark on a heart-pounding horror survival shooting experience. Unravel the mysteries as Jaxon Blair in Dr. Gloom's sinister lab. With its immersive atmosphere, pulse-pounding first-person action and twisted narrative, this solo-developed masterpiece keeps you on the edge until the end.

name: No Man's Area
description: NO MAN'S AREA is a gripping and hardcore FPS experience. Enlist with the rebel group, Dissenters, and traverse vibrant terrains. Combat both human and AI adversaries, striving to rescue Shiyuba while mastering survival tactics.

name: Ends
description: Immerse yourself in an authentic gritty experience set on the ruthless streets of London.

name: Grimrain
description: Grimrain is a fantasy MMO set in a world where the player starts as an lowly villager rescued by a helpful ranger, who sets out to explore who they are, why they find themselves in a realm slowly turning itself inside out, and the machinations that once helped ensure balance is maintained.

name: Project Hortus
description: Project Hortus is a city-building strategy game set in a distant future, after Earth has been destroyed. On the planet Hortus Prime, it's up to you to establish a new civilization. Manage your city, explore uncharted territories, and face unknown dangers.

name: Immortal's Way
description: Explore, fight, and fly as a small rabbit with swift moves in this action-adventure game inspired by Zelda and Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon. Discover ancient secrets, vanquish monsters from Chinese mythology, and choose to use dragon power or stay uncorrupted.

name: Depth Diver
description: Depth Diver is a co-op game where you go on an underwater trip with your friends to gather resources and repair underwater facilities in dangerous waters.

name: Warno: Southag
description: Warno: Southag takes the action to southern West Germany, as NATO’s reconstituted SOUTHAG counter-attacks against Warsaw Pact forces. Play 2 massive new Army General campaigns and 4 Operations as you command 10 new Divisions and units, including new nations Canada, Spain, and Czechoslovakia.

name: They Remain
description: In this massively multiplayer online game They Remain, band together with other survivors to scavenge for resources across the wildlands. Will you thrive amidst the chaos or succumb to those who remain?

name: Lume
description: Navigate a world on the brink of oblivion, as a lone guardian harnessing the power of light you unravel mysteries begging to be uncovered, overcome puzzles, and restore life to a shattered realm in this captivating adventure journey.

name: Casino Heist: Escape Room
description: You've just planned your next heist, the casino owned by the ruthless man who betrayed your mentor. As an experienced thief, solve puzzles and find clues to crack the advanced security systems. Will you be able to open the vault?

name: Synthetic
description: Put on your VR headset, get inside the warhammer, go into the post-post apopcolyptic world of Synthetic. fight challenging VR enemy's with an attachment of a wide arsenal of weaponry, from shoulder missle launchers to arm gatling guns!

name: Office Nightmare
description: Work sucks, and then you die... and apparently become a zombie. A fast-paced third person shooter with some unconventional weapons.

name: Casino Tycoon
description: Run your own casino. Count money, tamper with slots, hire staff and crooked dealers. Buy new machines, tables, security cameras, and hire bodyguards to protect your interests.

name: Nouns Crown
description: Dive into Nouns Crown, a wacky rogue-lite dungeon crawler where every day brings a new character to master. Embrace the chaos as unique abilities and weapons redefine your adventure every 24 hours in your quest to protect the all-powerful Nouns Crown from the invading Souls.

name: Cardian
description: CARDIAN is a deckbuilding dungeon crawler with fast-paced card battles, set in a colorful tabletop world of animals.

name: Chariot of Girl
description: Chariot of Girl is a single roguelike game developed by GreenSnow. This game combines strategy and combat elements, allowing players to experience unique tank racing fun. Players need to use intelligence and strategy to challenge various enemies in different levels and ultimately achieve game goals.

name: Dust & Rain: Post-apocalyptic RPG
description: Dust & Rain: Post-apocalyptic RPG is an immersive, story-driven top-down RPG - like Fallout. You will face hostile wasteland filled with combat challenges and moral choices. You will need to adapt and learn new skills to survive. Your actions shape devastated world. Who will you become?

name: Protocol:Null
description: In EAcity, the DICE gang rebelled against large corporations, causing a series of clashes between the two groups. The city turned into chaos. Aims to end this conflict. Two gang members, K-12 and Z4, were kidnapped and forced to sabotage DICE headquarters.

name: Captain McSpacebiff
description: Step into the Moonboots of Captain McSpacebiff and embark on a dangerous journey into the unknown! The Cold War is long over and Planet America has lost contact with one of its most distant colony worlds. You have been chosen, cryogenically frozen, and blasted across the galaxy to investigate.

name: Douga de Kiku Ano Kyoku no Rhythm Game
description: 動画で聞いたことがあるあの曲でリズムゲームを楽しもう！ あの異変探しゲーム『2番線 | Nibansen』『3番線 | Sanbansen』の制作陣が送る新作動画系リズムアクションゲーム！

name: PROG
description:
PROG, short for 'puzzle rooms of Gabriel', is a calm adventure game. It's a change from the fast-paced shoorters Soundwave produced before.

Point and click your way through puzzles, find Items and open the doors of this cardboard world.

name: Calorie-kun vs. Moguranian
description:
Calorie-kun vs. Moguranian is a 1986 arcade game by Graphic Techno EW (a partnership between VIC Tokai and Seibu Lease) and released by Sega in Japan.

You play as an egg-shaped being (presumably Calorie-kun) who must navigate through a maze, eating everything on screen. The first button causes the character to attack by blowing or spitting(?) something out of its mouth; this can be used to knock enemies back, set of bombs, destroy enemies by knocking them into bombs, etc. The only mode of vertical movement is with ladders. You can also drop bombs with the second button; exactly when is unknown.

A similarly designed mole creature would later appear as the boss of Level 5 in Decap Attack.

name: Vizul
description: Mirtilo is a very troubled guy. One morning, they left home nearly without a trace, looking for their missing parents. Coincidentally, Mirtilo's cousin, Garoa, would pay her beloved relatives a visit moments later! Nobody was home, though. Come along this whimsical, colorful adventure with the two cousins seeking answers at each's own pace.

name: Romance Choice
description: Romance Choice is a short and strange, 4th wall breaking dating simulator with a surprising amount of emotion and some very clever twists.

name: Gladiate!
description:
A Spectacle Fighter Card Game.

Play with 6 unique decks and fight your way through a gauntlet of foes. Not only do you need to fight to survive, but also pull off combos to maximize your spectacle points and please the crowd. Can you make it to the final boss and emerge victorious?

name: Is it OK to pick up Anomalies at a University?
description: Sin descripción

name: Doctor Who: Monster Invasion - Vortex Run
description: Amy Pond and the Eleventh Doctor are on a spaceship on Kaydon 36 when the Time Vortex rips through space. The Eleventh Doctor reaches the TARDIS in time, but Amy is left on the ship and has to run for her life. The Doctor needs to teleport Amy safely back into the TARDIS.

name: Clay-Scape
description: Beware, would-be-escaper, This colorful clay might be hiding something sinister underneath!

name: Rocktopus
description: Dive into a beautiful ocean of stop motion sea creatures and use eight of your fingers to control the eight legs of a xylophonic octopus. 'Rocktopus' is a music game with no rhythm required that works with QWERTY, AZERTY, and Dvorak keyboards. It was made for Stop Motion Jam 2020 with RAD studio, play dough, googly eyes, Fruit Loops, feathers, and artificial bacon bits. The jellyfish are real jelly!

name: Wizard of the 4 Corners
description:
Interpret a strange book of spells so you can transform into different animals and collect stars from the four corners of the world.

Created for Stop Motion Jam 2019 on the theme Shapeshifting. The game was created by H.H.Magoo in Delphi (RADstudio). The music was composed by Brother Kies using MuseScore3.

name: Dream Frontier
description:
Basil, Lavender, and Poppy are psychic friends on a quest to heal the divide between the normal world and the Dream Frontier. In this early adventure they travel to a small mountain village, meet strange characters, and solve the mystery of the Light from Prism Peak.

Dream Frontier is a turn-based role playing game inspired by Earthbound and 90’s SquareSoft RPGs. Players control a party of three characters, explore a colorful overworld, talk with characters in directed cutscenes, and engage with enemies in a simple combat system.
Encounters!

Encounter gameplay sticks to the basics of the genre with a few twists. Health is a “rolling counter” that doesn’t change instantly, giving the player time to act during a turn before it is drained. Each character has their own specialization and abilities that encourage varied play styles along with a unique Encore. The Encore system lets the characters build energy over an encounter and unleash a large psychic power.

name: The Rise of the Dough
description:
Once upon a time in a culinary land, a passionate Chef Heiny aspired to craft the finest bread imaginable.

Despite earnest attempts, his initial endeavors proved fruitless, leading him to discard the dough in frustration.

However, the following day brought an unexpected turn of events, and everything took a chaotic twist when Doug Heiny was born.

You must stop Doug H. from spreading across the world!

name: Palpable
description: Using photogrammetry we have converted every single frame of a claymation into an animated stop motion game character. Exploring the possibilities of maintaining the tactile and morphable qualities of clay togheter with the felxibility of an interactive 3D space.

name: Reclaym the Kingdom
description:
This game was developed in 7 very long days for the Epic MegaJam 2021 by Work Hard, Clay Hard. They are: Daniel Asperen (Level Design), Morris Belfrage (Animation), Josh Dutton (Audio), Luke Parkes-Haskell (Design), and Oskar Selin (Art).

The Kingdom of Plato once held aloft in the sky, falls into ruin. It has been abandoned by the High-Kings of old, leaving the denizens trapped as it slowly decays and crumbles into the abyss. They are quite literally running out of space - and it's only going to get worse.

Enter our erstwhile adventurer, Cassius who seeks to claim the throne, ergo the Kingdom for himself - and will stop at nothing to get it.

Navigate and fight your way through a world full of devious enemies, and defeat them by picking up floor tiles and using them as deadly projectiles - but you need to take great care, as each time you remove a floor tile, you give yourself one less to stand on, and you too may find yourself running out of space.

name: When Pigs Can Fly: Enter The Aporkalypse
description: In this apocalyptic SHMUP game, pigs are taking over the earth thanks to a zombie virus plaguing the worlds pig population. You are the hero of humanity and with the use of your biomechanical suit you can turn anything into a weapon.

name: Eat Me!
description: Eat Me! is a point and Click Adventure game where the props were shot using Claymation techniques. You are a parasite controlling small creatures to get eaten by the larger creature to gain power. You must solve environmental puzzles to get noticed and eaten by the larger creature and then hack their brains to gain control.

name: Ribbit Channel
description: Ribbit Channel is a short interactive cartoon. Graphics is done entirely in claymation, and the game itself is filled with color and warmth. The bright plasticine world could motivate anyone to sculpt from modelling clay, and perhaps remind you of your childhood. Ribbit Channel will make you happier and cheer you up on a rainy day.

name: Blood Beat Club
description:
Welcome to "Blood Beat Club"! Step into the shoes of Clayd, the ultimate vampire slayer, as he ventures into the heart of the night.

Navigate through neon-lit dance floors, each pulsating with energy and danger, as you match your moves to the rhythm of the music.

name: Ojo Por Ojo
description:
Ojo Por Ojo was created for Spain Game Devs Jam II and it won the third place in art category thanks to the unique clamation aesthetic.

This is a crazy pass and play race game where you must collect five body parts to win.

name: Barraka
description: Barraka is a claymation adventure game full of puzzles and surprises. Join our brave heroine as she explores the spooky fair in the small town. Along the way, she will encounter weird and wonderful characters and challenges. You will also have fun with bumper cars, whack-a-mole, the haunted house, a mini circus and more! Barraka is a game that will delight your senses and imagination.

name: Jelly-Jelly
description:
Jelly-Jelly tells the epic tale of a jellyfish trying to find its place in the world.

Swim around the claymation environment, collecting starfish and avoiding the angry sea urchins (those guys are real spiky jerks!)

name: Silenus
description: Uncover the secrets of an oil refinery operated by an obscure organization in this short, atmospheric narrative adventure.

name: Margin of the Strange
description: Margin of the Strange is a gardening-themed mystery-exploration game about the world of human dreams from the developers behind OneShot. Over the course of 6 weeks, Ling seeks to find out more about this world in order to unravel the mysteries surrounding his own life... and his own death.

name: Three Bulky Bears
description: The evil circular witch Rolldilocks has kicked the three bears out of their home! Time to get back and kick her out! In this 2D platformer, switch between Baby Bear, Mama Bear, and Papa Bear to navigate a variety of obstacles, as you roll, jump, swim, and smash your way through 2 challenging worlds!

name: Monster Quest
description: You are a powerful wizard, hurl elemental spells at your foes and try to get the highest score you can!

name: Wizkid
description: Dodge deadly blades and leap over terrifying pitfalls to unearth reality-bending artifacts and spells as the Wizkid! Explore an enormous castle and delve into its labyrinthine dungeons in this side-scrolling platformer adventure where you must ultimately face an enemy beyond imagination.

name: A Twisted Place
description: A Twisted Place is an unconventional Single-Player Horror game with multiple chapters. Wander through a disturbing & mysterious place while hiding from entities and find a way out. Interract with the environment to find tools, information and secrets.

name: ExMortalis
description: Awaken in a Victorian tower, face biotech horrors. ExMORTALIS: a stealth horror FPS, inspired by System Shock and Prey. Explore, survive, fight, hide. Choose implants for power or outmaneuver foes. Uncover the truth behind Necrotechs' experiments.

name: Eerie Excavation
description: Eerie Excavation is a first person horror game. You wander into haunted mines in search of quick fame and fortune, but will you make it out alive ?

name: Morphscape: The Stylized Prop Pursuit
description: Welcome to Morphscape, an immersive and exhilarating stylized prop hunt game that sets the stage for a thrilling cat-and-mouse chase amidst visually captivating and creatively designed levels.

name: Neverseas
description:
Ahoy, captain! Welcome and join us to find out the untold tale of Neverseas, where time and space is a dream and you are a sand grain in an endless lost sea that careless wanderer can fall into. The main question is are you brave enough to dive into it?

Neversas is an open-world sandbox action RPG from a third-person perspective. The game takes place in the era of graceful sailing ships and pirate romance, and you are invited to try yourself in the role of a real captain of a sailing ship. Here you have to manage a team, monitor the condition of ships, improve and modernize them, and you must also not forget about individual equipment, because on land you will not protect several of the modern capabilities of your ship.

name: Neden
description: Step into the fantastic world of Neden and create your unique character! You can meet new friends and explore thrilling game modes like deathmatch, battle royale, survival, and much more. But what exactly is Neden?

name: Helmo Online
description: Helmo is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game created for people who love this style of gameplay. Even though it is a modern and advanced game, Helmo also has a unique and classic graphic. We are in the initial testing phase, looking for possible bugs and improving gameplay. The game will change a lot as we are still in development.

name: Horse Mansion
description: Horse Mansion is an atmospheric horror game where the player must find items and solve puzzles in order to explore more of the mansion. However, the player quickly finds they are not alone...

name: Vacuum Balaena
description:
Take a short while and enter in an underwater world and embody a whale named Melouchax. Explore the depth of the ocean, and try to answer to your own needs, which are : breathin' and eatin' fishes. But be careful to not eat different kind of trash which draws into swarm of fishes, or you're going to accumulate to much CO2 inside you.

This game exists thanks to the NUPES Game Jam. During 32 hours we work on it, we also pick the theme which is about the pollution and how critical it is.

name: Panomino
description: The rogue-like deck-building falling-block puzzle-game

name: Click On Ladybugs Together
description: Can you and your friends find all 100+ ladybugs in this panoramic level? Difficulty: Medium (but has small objects)

name: Fly Fly Monster Truck 2
description: Get ready to fulfill your childhood dream of driving a monster truck in Fly Fly Monster Truck 2!

name: Two Sides of Hell
description: Demons, abominations, bossfights, violence and intense fast-paced action. That is what Two Sides of Hell has to offer, in highly engaging procedurally generated levels. Fight with or against the BFA: you choose your faith.

name: Doctor Who: Battle of Time
description: Doctor Who: Battle of Time is a time-travelling adventure experienced through a card-collectible game.

name: Koi Suru! Brother-kun
description: Sin descripción

name: Act Normal!
description: ACT NORMAL! is the first-ever ultra-realistic physics sandbox dating sim! All you need to do is to eat food and impress the girl, just like in real life.

name: A Fistful of Yankees
description: There is only one rule in the Wild West, the rule of the gun. Lead a fistful of Yankee soldiers on a mission to bring order to this chaotic frontier, facing desperados, robber barons, and more in a spaghetti western RTS adventure like no other.

name: Afterlife
description: Afterlife is a visual novel about life after death. Shoplift cosmetics and destroy evidence of your crimes.

name: Aether Fly
description: Go on a journey through countless dimensions shaped by bullets and sound.

name: Rakeo
description: Rakeo is a precision platformer about collecting cookies! Find secrets, face bosses, and collect lots of cookies!

name: A College of Thirst & Claws: Season 1
description: An immersive, story-driven adult visual novel. As a werewolf joining a supernatural college, you'll be thrown into the deep end of a sinister conspiracy in the town of Lanstone. Develop relationships with beautiful women as you shape the story with your choices.

name: Hentai Cute Pazzle
description: Hentai Cute Pazzle - a logical game in which your task is to collect puzzles and open the pictures.You need to collect puzzles to going at the next level.

name: Sex Wishes
description: Immerse yourself in the world of magic and mysteries in the visual novel for adults - Sex Wishes. Embark on an exciting journey to the High Academy of Magic Avermort, a prestigious university for chosen wizards.

name: King in Yellow: Endless Sex Drama
description: The best way to please the gods is through sexual intercourse! Fellow believers, join me, Laurentia, in immersing ourselves in the sex drama. With stranger development, multiple partners, golden showers, cheongsams, kimonos... everything is for the divinity in our hearts.

name: Zombiology
description: Help a mad scientist discover the secret to immortality in this physics based puzzle game. Explore hundreds of levels in the micro-cosmos, as you combine simple shapes into complex protein strands to help mend broken bones, ward off nasty viruses, and revive cells.

name: Zodchy
description: Embark on an intergalactic journey unlike any other in Zodchy, a groundbreaking MMO experience that seamlessly blends RPG, survival, and action elements in a thrilling sci-fi narrative centered around planetary colonization.

name: College Diaries
description: College Diaries is a simulation game set against the backdrop of college life. Players take on the role of a college freshman, shaping their college career by choosing different majors, joining various clubs, participating in campus activities.

name: Taoist Down the Hill
description: Due to emotional confusion, I joined Xinlonghu Mountain and became a Taoist. Now I am going down the mountain to travel and slay demons and eliminate demons.

name: Cyber Loop
description: "Cyber Loop" combines TPS shooting & Roguelike mechanics in a survival adventure. As amnesiac Thomas, explore randomized mazes, uncover dark secrets. Intense battles, unpredictable worlds, & custom gear create unique gameplay. Add to Steam Wishlist; embark on a post-apocalyptic odyssey!

name: WarOFuture
description: WarOFuture is a two-player card and chess game inspired by military chess, where two players are divided into red and blue factions, manipulate their own chess to attack and destroy each other's chess pieces. You can also use pre-builded magic cards with different effects to assist in battle.

name: Strongest Solider Training System: Heavy Firepower de Isekai Musou
description: Strongest Soilder Training System ~heavy firepower de ISEKAI Musou~ is a top-down arena ROGUELITE game. The mysterious ball of light that suddenly appeared, and the 『Shop』. Purchase props and weapons from the 「Shop」 to strengthen yourself. Defeat slimes, orcs, and even dragons!

name: Boredom Survivor
description: What can you do in this survivor-style game? Switch between different characters, craft various types of equipment, collect sets, choose from a variety of skills, and create your own combat style! And who knows, perhaps there are some secrets waiting to be discovered in this dull town.

name: Revelation of Decay
description: Zombies have taken over our homes! Pick up guns, organize a brave team, and fuck up those monsters! Farm land, scavenge a large apocalyptic world, and fight various of zombies! Modify your weapons, defeat scaring bosses, and finally uncover the truth behind the zombie outbreak and save our home!

name: Kamigoroshi no Aogin
description: Sin descripción

name: Yin-Yang Labyrinth
description: "Yin-Yang Labyrinth" is a Chinese-style multiplayer online Roguelike dungeon crawler game. One step to life, one step to death. Mysterious and deadly labyrinths. You and your companions find yourselves trapped in a bizarre maze. You must work together to overcome challenges and escape the labyrinth.

name: Escape From The Tutorial
description: "Escape from the Tutorial" is a tactical turn-based RPG. Play as Lazar, a young man aiming to become a hero, starting his adventure in Tutorial, a village that belies its welcoming name. Escape the bitter life, utilize battle strategies, meet unique companions, and unveil the secrets of this world.

name: Aduro
description: An adventure game where players, as embers, journey to rekindle the eternal flame, battling the encroaching darkness with light-based mechanics.

name: Act Casual
description: Act Casual is a multiplayer party game with chaotic and fun ragdoll-physics combat. You are aliens but are disguised as humans and must maintain disguises or face survival challenges in minigames across stages. Play a wide array of characters, weapons, and environments and with up to 8 players.

name: Ace
description: Can you find all of the geodes and escape a cosmic horror in this unique, stylized platformer world? Collect upgrades to help you explore and meet strange characters. Done with the story? Procedurally create a near infinite number of unique levels that you can share with the world.

name: 100 Hidden Cats in Games
description: Help your favorite Videogame Characters - They can't help themselve, after all they are cats now! They need some help collecting all of their stuff, afterwards you just need to find them. 100 Cats to find and even more objects to find aswell!

name: Into Oblivion
description: Into Oblivion is an immerse interactive novel where your choices shape the story. Set in the far-future, explore a galaxy on the brink of crisis with dynamic companions. So, settle your mind and pray you have what it takes to fly Into Oblivion.

name: Baba Is Cool 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Steel Hunters
description: Steel Hunters is a Free-to-Play, PvPvE shooter with futuristic mech battles. Fight to collect rare loot on an abandoned Earth, and use combat tactics to turn rivals into scrap. Choose your Hunter and playstyle to battle 5 other duo teams. Only one can extract from the Hunting Grounds.

name: Entity
description: Entity is a game about a girl who wakes up with sleep paralysis, a stage between awake and dreaming. She's struggling with moving her body while she's surrounded by shadow creatures, she needs your help to wake up!

name: Sonic Legends
description: Sonic Legends is a non-profit fan project and re-imagining of classic, notable levels throughout the long-lasting history of Sonic fan games!

name: The Legend of Zelda: Era of Decline
description: The Legend of Zelda: Era of Decline is a fan game based on the first The Legend of Zelda, aiming to be a remake for it. It was taken down by Nintendo after it received media coverage.

name: Assassin's Creed Shadows: Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Five Nights At Maggies
description: This game is a fan game created by Michael Genaro. It is a FNAF (Five Nights At Freddys) remix/remake, click and point horror game, very difficult but very fun! Completely recommend! Also, This game is not mine however the actual developer has not added it to this site, and since it was made 2~3 months ago, i thought i would add it myself for him, the rest of the info is on the official (gamejolt) release site, i could not find any other.

name: Prelude Dark Pain
description: Prelude Dark Pain is a Tactical RPG set in a dark fantasy world. Assume the role of a local blacksmith named Soren, lead an uprising against the Order of the Ash Crusade and save a world ravaged by war.

name: Godzilla: Save the Earth - Melee
description: Godzilla: Save the Earth - Melee is a fan-made mod project by Godzilla fans for Godzilla fans. Originally beginning in 2021 as a simple "overhaul" of the 2004 game Godzilla: Save the Earth by Pipeworks Studios, STE Melee evolved over the years into an unofficial fully-fledged sequel to the Pipeworks Godzilla games we've all been waiting for!

name: Domovoy
description:
You are a Dom.0V0Y MDL 2.36. You are a robot vacuum cleaner tasked with maintaining the cleanliness of your owner's home during the night. You must make sure that you collect all of the dust within the house, or you may be returned to the store and/or scrapped for parts. Be wary for any sounds you hear; they may be indications of more dust appearing in the house.

You perceive your surroundings through your advanced LiDar scanner. Pressing space will scan the environment around you, creating a 3d snapshot for you to explore. Keep in mind, picking up dust will not remove the scanned version of it. However, it will not pick up on scans again. Make sure to scan often so that you have a clear view of your surroundings.

name: He Sneaks
description: Your car has broken down, seek help in a small old house! But you are not alone there, save yourself from the evil demon ...

name: Deck Defense
description: Deck Defense is a deck building tower defense game, where the player controls both their defenses and the expansion of the map. Expand your deck after each wave with one of over 65 cards to choose from, and try to keep the enemy blobs from reaching the portal.

name: Crime Simulator
description: Crime Simulator is a co-op game you can become a criminal. Start as a lowlife and slowly work your way up by completing jobs, stealing and more. Take over enemy hideouts, build your own weed farm. Do everything with friends, or alone. Go in guns blazing or be quiet and stealthy. It's all up to you.

name: Skyblivion
description:
Skyblivion is the ultimate fan-made experience for the Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion, bringing the game into the newer engine of the Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim. This process combines Oblivion’s impressive award-winning open-world that is renowned for its incredible gameplay, memorable quests, and expansive world space with the advancements in gaming that have been made in the last two decades. Set in the Elder Scroll’s Third Era, during the cataclysmic Oblivion Crisis, you must help to restore the Imperial throne and repel the demonic Daedric invasion.

Skyblivion will feature the remastered entirety of Oblivion’s mainland, Cyrodiil, from the wintery slopes of the Valus and Jerall Mountains to the swamps of Blackwood and warm-beachy shores of the Gold Coast. Skyblivion will bring the return of many classic Oblivion mechanics like spell crafting, a complete class and attributes system, underwater combat, and NPC disposition.

In addition to recreating Oblivion’s systems and porting them into the Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim’s engine the project has taken great care in providing new improvements and additions. Skyblivion offers fans remastered graphics, weather, and lighting, an expanded soundtrack, new gameplay mechanics, and even a limited selection of bespoke minor quests with original voice acting to further flesh out barren areas of Oblivion—all for free!

Once Skyblivion is released in 2025, fans will have access to the entirety of Oblivion’s pre-DLC world space, systems, and quests available for play. But that’s not the end of the project! Following a period of bug-fixing and community-supported updates the project development team will move on to working on Oblivion’s nine additional content releases plus the Shivering Isles expansion.

With Skyblivion you experience the best of both worlds: The complex and detailed RPG experience of Oblivion paired with Skyrim’s newer systems, graphics, and quality of life improvements. Will you close shut the jaws of Oblivion once more in 2025?

name: Skin & Scales
description: Sin descripción

name: The Northern Passage
description: The Northern Passage is a (work in progress) horror fantasy CYOA, where you play as a hunter sent up north to investigate a series of missing people along the border of your home country and in the port cities of the Blackwater.

name: Swiped! Double Shots of Love
description:
"Swiped!: Double Shots of Love" is a romantic visual novel featuring a slightly older cast of 4 main love interests. You can customise your MC's name and pronouns.

This game features cussing, I'd usually recommend for a slightly older audience due to the cast of dateables.

name: Conventional Vampires
description: Sin descripción

name: The Batchelor
description: Sin descripción

name: 1 4 the $
description: 1 4 the $ ("One For the Money") was written in three days as an entry to the SeedComp! 2024 sprouting round. It tells a story of consumption. It is intended for mature audiences.

name: La Quête du Dentiste
description: A French RPG

name: Power Stakes
description: Power Stakes is the first game in the horse simulation game series by Tose Software, in the game the player can only go through different stats of horses, places & jockeys. the game is heavy on japanese text, so only people that can fully understand japanese will like this game. There is no gameplay at all, since the player can only choose to view different races from different camera angles.

name: Favor
description: Sin descripción

name: Snootz Math Trek
description: An educational game where you work your way through various activities and games.

name: I Saw A Strange Little Man
description: A mostly non-video exploration game where you discover the story of a fantasy world from characters, discover secrets, and ultimately search for a bottle.

name: Electro Game Collection
description: Electro Game Collection is a series of LCD handheld games found in Japanese Gacha Machines. The game comes in 5 different colour variants.

name: Kebab Simulator
description: Cook kebab in comfort of your home

name: Signy & Mino: Against All Gods
description: Signy & Mino: Against All Gods is a new kind of combo RPG where you and your pup piece together flashy combos to dismantle a plethora of enemies! Discover your hidden powers as you find yourself hurtled into a conflict amongst the gods.

name: Dwellink: War of the Nine
description: Dwellink is a dark fantasy creature collector RPG, set in a universe under siege. The Great Link opened portals connecting the Nine Worlds of Kohara, allowing ferocious Dwellers to spread chaos and destruction. It's up to you to discover the source of the cataclysm and end it once and for all!

name: Project T
description: Project T is a 1–4-person co-op PVE shooter currently in early development. Load your shotgun, ready your truck, and team up to traverse a haunting and dangerous world, facing waves of enemies from the darkest corners of The Entity’s Realm.

name: Connie and the Essence of Chaos
description: Connie and the Essence of Chaos is a cute 2D adventure inspired by past platforming classics. JUMP and PUNCH your way through 6 distinct and colorful worlds on your quest to defeat the evil overlord Lucilate and free the island of Cuisinia from his reign of terror!

name: Real Stories From The Grave: A Date to Keep
description: Enter the shoes of Samuel Scowl, and experience the horror of a dissolving family unit and an unkempt mind. Discover the truth through Samuel’s warped perception and piece together the reality that eludes him.

name: Spot H9
description: Horror game made for Callum Upton's Game Jam.

name: Snowtrix
description: Sin descripción

name: Deadlock
description: Deadlock is an upcoming multiplayer game from Valve in early development.

name: Cthulhu Valley
description: You've inherited your grandfather's old farm plot. Unfortunately, it's a cursed hellscape seeped in eldritch dread. Harvest demonic plants. Find the Cooking Book of The Dead. Sacrifice your friends. Or just grow carrots. Cthulhu can wait, he has always been waiting.

name: Eldritch Tactics: Lichtmond
description: Eldritch Tactics: Lichtmond is a turn-based strategy game based on german folklore. After her untimely demise, the Burgund queen Kriemhild and her allied troops find themselves trapped in the Anderswelt where they face an onslaught of undead creatures as well as their own steadily declining sanity.

name: Frontier Mayhem
description: A battle royale game that you never played before! Frontier Mayhem brings out all the action packed, fast paced, adrenaline ride you can hope for in a vehicle combat game!

name: Clean Sweep
description: A 3D, comedic, character-driven, action-RPG where everyone in Cleanland is a personification of a cleaning product! As the town janitor you'll befriend the residents of Cleanland and team up with them to fight germs!

name: Chibi Escape
description: Long ago, you were cursed. Now you have to fight for your life by either killing hopeless Chibies, or by trying to escape the map. Loot chests, hide from the Killer, use special abilities, collaborate with others, betray them. Do everything to escape from the map alive.

name: Chowdown Kitty
description: Chowdown Kitty is a cozy Match 3 game where you line up tiles of treats to feed and unlock an adorable CAT-alogue of kitty’s and dress them up in cute accessories and toys!

name: All Doe's Life
description: It's a story of a small-town girl with no name. You're going on a one-person journey with a camera, find the right angle, then press the shutter. Look closely, solve the puzzles, and see each different side of her.

name: Cool Go
description: a very fun fantastic game.Suitable for families to play together and spend a wonderful leisure time.you will be a magic boy,running in a fantastic world just like you comeback to your childhood.

name: Ironmarked
description: Ironmarked is a 1 to 3 player co-op RPG with turn-based combat, set in a medieval fantasy world inspired by Renaissance Italy. Select your band of deadly mercenaries to take on perilous quests from the local factions, just remember the most important rule… get paid!

name: SpinSweep
description: Control a spinning cleaner and clean up garbages. With just movement controls, cleaning tools will combine one after another, bringing surprises and exhilaration. Let's use unique cleaning tools on various stages to aim for high scores.

name: Realms of Alterra
description: Explore Realms of Alterra, an AI-Sandbox RPG fusing GPT-based AI & stunning procedural worlds. Carve your path, form bonds, and reveal new realms in this Nordic adventure. Witness revolutionary AI, intricate world-building, and emergent gameplay in this constantly evolving, immersive journey.

name: Chest
description: Afternoon, sunshine, pool, sound of flowing water, and... a dream? This is 'Chest'.

name: RadioWave
description: Welcome to RadioWorld! An amazing attraction filled with robotics with the latest artificial intelligence and robust systems put in place for all ages to come and enjoy... or at least that's what RadioWorld was before the incident. RadioWave is always watching. Do you have what it takes to survive?

name: Whispers of The Abyss
description: Whispers of The Abyss is a horror game set on an old, abandoned oil rig owned by a ruthless corporation, Mangrove Dynamics. Your task is to survive. Just survive. And remember one thing: machines and fluid are your best allies.

name: Cat Cafe Simulator
description: Start your new life as the owner of a charming but rundown Cat Cafe. Your mission? To clean, renovate, and bring warmth to a place where both humans and cats can find comfort in the cozy ambiance of your making.

name: Warlanes
description: Experience the fusion of WWII action and strategic MOBA-style gameloop. Lead your troops in third-person shooter battles, guide them down their lanes, and siege the enemy base in a war-torn landscape.

name: Strange Tales of Tei-Shan
description: Strange Tales of Tieshan is a text adventure inspired by Chinese records of anomalies. As a traveler in a dark land of monsters, you make elixirs, choose paths, and negotiate with supernatural beings to survive and collect bizarre stories to appease a possessed book and escape.

name: Trench Tales
description: A story-driven third-person action game set in a dark, alternative world between WWI and WWII. Harness unique powers, customize your arsenal, and navigate haunting Gothic landscapes. Battle fallen soldiers as you uncover the mysteries of this realm.

name: Fantastic Frolic
description: Embark on a whimsical quest to save the world in Fantastic Frolic. Play as Lil' J, Esther or Gorf and use your unique abilities to defeat monsters and uncover the truth behind the volcanic explosion prophecy. Explore a vibrant world, gather resources, and level up in this delightful adventure.

name: Gunpowder Massacre
description: Gunpowder Massacre is a 2D action shooter with Rogue-Lite elements set in a steampunk atmosphere. Play as one of the only survivors after the MP-2000 virus changed the world. Survive the hordes of enemies, defeat as many as you can, and showcase your skills to put your name in the Hall of Fame!

name: Vitriol
description: Physics based VR movement shooter MARCH FOR YOUR GOD

name: Disaster Plan Z
description: Disaster Plan Z is a hardcore single-player shooting survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Players need to utilize various weapons along with their unique skills, construct different buildings, and continuously upgrade to resist the invasion of countless zombies and mutant creatures.

name: StressRoom
description: With Stress Room VR, boring days are a thing of the past! Put on your VR goggles, grab a baseball bat, and smash everything in the room to relieve stress! Your room becomes an explosion arena, push your limits, and unwind!

name: Machine Challenger
description: Multiplayer Vehicle Combat game. Set in chaotic 2041, you are one of a few, who can experience “The Program”. All Around Reality Show, which takes place in the Machine Challenger arena.

name: Adorable Dog: Gnomeageddon
description: The Gnome Legion has attacked! Save your friends, defend the village and bring the fight to the gnomes! Travel to unique worlds and recruit your animal buddies to help destroy those gnome once and for all!

name: Dimachaerus
description: Dimachaerus is a Hack'n Slash game in which you have to face hordes of enemies using weapons found in the scenario, use different weapons and make different combos to defeat the zombies that have dominated the kingdom, but be careful too you're fragile like an undead.

name: Fern Light
description: Play as Wanda, a 17-year-old on a quest to uncover a Polish legend's secrets. Solve puzzles, explore captivating landscapes, and dive into a richly hand-drawn world of mystery and magic. Ready for an unforgettable adventure?

name: Gun Shop 3
description: Do you like guns? Many people sure do! Gun Shop 3 is a real-time storefront simulator with a sprinkling of first person shooter mechanics on top. Choose your location, design your store, stock the shelves, and then flip that sign to “open for business”! The demand is there. Can you supply it?

name: Tornado Emergency
description: A storm chasing simulation/strategy based game that immerses players in the thrill of tracking and intercepting tornadoes.

name: Star Voyage: Treasure Hunting
description: This is an independent game that has been developed by two people in our studio for many years. Thank you to everyone who has supported our product.At present, the game is still a beta version, if you encounter bugs and other problems, please contact us, you will get a red diamond reward.

name: Battle Simulator
description: You can use the combat simulator to simulate the battle pace under three damage calculation formulas (addition, division, multiplication), and in the settings, you can choose to restart after the battle ends to calculate win rates.

name: Sodden
description: The story of survival in a closed scientific town. There are unexplained anomalies around every corner. There are terrifying monsters behind every door. Survive while a dark otherworldly something penetrates the world, absorbing everything around.

name: Arishihi no Watashi-tachi he
description: 'Arishihi no watashitachi e' is a "reversed pastoral adventure" set in a world where only lush nature and remnants of civilization remain. In this world, a boy who has lost his memory and a girl dreaming of adulthood weave their future together.

name: A Surgery Beyond The Heart
description: This is a pix word puzzle adventure game based on RPGMaker.With serval different choice,you will get total different endings. You need to play the Germany returned genius doctor Shen Yi to find the dark side of the hospital.

name: Devices Tycoon
description: Devices Tycoon is a unique business simulator that will make you feel like the owner of a company that creates your own devices! In the game you can create your own smartphones, tablets, laptops, smart watches, headphones, operating systems and even your own processors!

name: Turn Based Boxing
description: In this turn-based (optional auto-battler) simulation game, you'll recruit, train, and manage a roster of boxing champions as you strive to build the ultimate fighting dynasty.

name: Abandoned Moons
description: Embark with your friends to explore abandoned moons in search of resources and valuable loot in a cooperative first-person horror experience. Level up and assemble a complete arsenal of tools, gadgets, and helper robots to accomplish the mission.

name: Ninelives
description: Ninelives is an open world online RPG focused on freely searching and adventuring in a unique world and building characters with items and skills. We aim to create a game where players can enjoy the pleasures of simple RPG, such as discovering, collecting, battling, in their own relaxed pace. Step into this broad land and experience the unknown world.

name: The Nightmare of the Air Balloon
description: A horror game based on a nightmare about a hot air balloon that is used for eyesight testing.

name: Overturn
description: Sin descripción

name: Virtual Goose!
description: Sin descripción

name: Cosmic Climb
description: Harness the power of the AIR JORDAN 11 LOWS to help Stef and Tia defeat the robo-alien forces and save Earth.

name: Sapo 3D
description: Sapo 3D is a 3D short and experimental platformer with classic elements and a frog protagonist, created with love and pacience.

name: Zelda 64: Recompiled - Ocarina of Time
description: A static recompilation of The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time which aims to add many improvements over the original console version.

name: Undercroft
description: Under the old forgotten church lies a sprawling crypt, filled with lost histories and abandoned secrets. Search through the forgotten catacombs and uncover the mystery behind it's creation. Maybe you can find out how to save yourself along the way.

name: Ponder
description: A fishing simulation game set in a lush fantasy world.

name: Steal Deal
description: Embark on a 2D shooting adventure alone or with friends! Navigate randomly generated levels, enhance your character, and strive to attain the Divine Deal in this action-packed game!

name: Delic
description: Explore the countryside of Brazil in this third person survival horror game. Fight, survive, and discover that sometimes good intentions can lead to devastating results.

name: Dead Don't Die
description: Dead Don't Die is a top-down action shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. Every encounter is high-stakes; one stray bullet or sneaky knife attacker is all it takes to end your run ... not to mention the zombies that grab hold and won't let go. So use cover, be accurate, and be quick or be dead.

name: Zenatria
description: It's time to answer the call, go into battle against the forces of Yurmim to defend the town from the onslaught of enemies.

name: Shadows of Betrayal
description: Dive into Shadows of Betrayal, a horror/thriller visual novel about recent high school graduates, who head to a remote cabin for a celebration of sorts. Navigate friendships, delve into (optional) romance, and brace for suspenseful twists. Can you survive the unexpected, and what will it cost you?

name: Farkas: the Last Redhaft
description: As the last survivor of the dojo, the responsibility is on you. Parkour your way through the most dangerous mines. Slash the enemies in the forest and master the art of the sword.

name: Popping Bubble
description: This game combines Tetris-style gameplay with a unique twist. Balls of various colors fall from the top, and you connect same-colored balls to touch both walls, earning points. Realistic physics add unpredictability. Chain reactions increase scores tenfold, encouraging strategic play.

name: Riser of Babel
description: Avoid all obstacles and get high as you can! Riser of Babel is endless 2d jump platform puzzle game. Stack different style blocks for your character and run for higher score! Master stacking tower and challenge for avoid falling debris and critical lighting!

name: Gun Runners
description: Blast your way through ever increasing hordes of space bandits and alien creatures in this action roguelite. Level up your character and obtain powerful upgrade items with a variety of effects. Procedurally generated enemy waves and item choices prevent any two runs from playing out the same way.

name: Bruno: Lost In Nightmares
description: A Metroidvania game Where the player will have to face their worst nightmares With a sword, bow and arrow, and some secret powers.

name: Pixel Tennis
description: Pixel Tennis is a captivating online multiplayer tennis game crafted with love by a single indie developer. Dive into the world of fast-paced arcade style tennis, where every match is a thrilling rally. Create and customize your own character and team up with a friend or play solo against the world.

name: A Dungeon Is You
description: You died and got reincarnated as a dungeon core! Grow your dungeon, summon minions to defend you and conquer the world. A Dungeon Is You is a modern incremental dungeon management game. With a sprinkle of tower defense and rpg.

name: Project Rebearth
description: The game is set in a post-apocalyptic utopia where you rebuild society after a global collapse. A massive online multiplayer where everyone plays on an exact replica of planet earth. Grow your town, trade with other players, face challenges and discover the rich history of the planet.

name: Hoyo
description: The world's fate lays on Hoyo's hands. In this dark adventure your hero instinct will guide you through the unknown, but rescuing survivors, piloting a ship and taking action to destroy invaders will not come easy.

name: Card TD
description: CardTD is a hybrid tower defense and a deck-building game. Packaged with a ton of user freedom in playstyles with a progression system that lets you play at your own pace.
